review.classdesign.jammy.addons

Interface ILanguageManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProcessManager, JavaManager, PythonManager

    public interface ILanguageManager
    An ILanguageManager is in charge of managing problem solver execution by providing for a given problem, following features :
    • Retrieving a valid project instance
    • Retrieving a valid solver file
    • Run a given solver file for a given output.
    Such manager can be registered to Jammy using the extension point review.classdesign.jammy.addons.
    Author:
    fv

    • Method Detail

      • getProject

        org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject getProject(Problem problem,
                                               org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                        throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        Retrieves the project associated to the given problem if exist. Creates it using the given monitor otherwise.
        Parameters:
        problem - Problem to retrieve project from.
        monitor - Monitor instance to use for project creation.
        Returns:
        Retrieved project instance.
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - If any error occurs while creating the project.

      • getSolver

        org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile getSolver(Problem problem,
                                           org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                    throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        Retrieves the solver file associated to the given problem if exist. Creates it using the given monitor otherwise.
        Parameters:
        problem - Problem to retrieve solver file from.
        monitor - Monitor instance to use for solver file creation.
        Returns:
        Retrieved solver file instance.
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - If any error occurs while creating the file.

      • getRunner

        ISolverRunner getRunner(ProblemSolver solver,
                        org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
        Retrieves a valid ISolverRunner instance that could manage the given solver execution.
        Parameters:
        solver - Solver instance to get valid runner from.
        monitor - Monitor instance used for creating runner.
        Returns:
        Created runner instance for executing the given solver
